front.title: CBOR Object Signing and Encryption (COSE): Hash Algorithms

abstract.t: The CBOR Object Signing and Encryption (COSE) syntax RFC 8152 does not define any direct methods for using hash algorithms. There are however circumstances where hash algorithms are used: Indirect signatures, where the hash of one or more external contents are signed, or thumbprints, for identification of X.509 certificates or other objects. This document defines a set of hash algorithms that are identified by COSE Algorithm Identifiers.
